body.name: PHILIPS 22 inch Class Thin Full HD (1920 x 1080) 75Hz Monitor, VESA, HDMI & VGA Port, 4 Year Advance Replacement Warranty, 221V8LN
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 2 hrs 41 mins
FREE delivery February 15 - 20. Order within 15 hrs 41 mins.
features: CRISP CLARITY: This 22 inch class (21.45″ viewable) Philips V line monitor delivers crisp Full HD 1920x1080 visuals. Enjoy movies, shows and videos with remarkable detail
INCREDIBLE CONTRAST: The VA panel produces brighter whites and deeper blacks. You get true-to-life images and more gradients with 16.7 million colors
THE PERFECT VIEW: The 178/178 degree extra wide viewing angle prevents the shifting of colors when viewed from an offset angle, so you always get consistent colors

WORK SEAMLESSLY: This sleek monitor is virtually bezel-free on three sides, so the screen looks even bigger for the viewer. This minimalistic design also allows for seamless multi-monitor setups that enhance your workflow and boost productivity
A BETTER READING EXPERIENCE: For busy office workers, EasyRead mode provides a more paper-like experience for when viewing lengthy documents
75HZ FAST REFRESH RATE: 75 Hz (via HDMI 1.4) brings your favorite movies and video games to life. Stream, binge, and play effortlessly
SMOOTH ACTION WITH ADAPTIVE-SYNC: Adaptive-Sync technology ensures fluid action sequences and rapid response time. Every frame will be rendered smoothly with crystal clarity and without stutter
DESIGNED FOR YOUR WELLBEING: Philips monitors use LowBlue Mode to reduce harmful shortwave blue light. Flicker-free technology alleviates eye fatigue for more comfortable extended computing
USER CONVENIENCE: Robust connections include HDMI 1.4, VGA and audio out. VESA compatibility gives you flexible mounting options
PEACE OF MIND: Philips monitors come with 4-Year Advance Replacement Warranty in the United States, minimizing downtime
body.description: The Philips 221V8LN 21.5" Monitor boasts Full HD 1920x1080 picture quality for an incredible sense of depth and clarity. With a wide viewing angle VA display and 16.7 million colors, you get vivid images with detail from every vantage point. Switch from working to gaming seamlessly with 75Hz speedy refresh rate. Adaptive-Sync technology ensures fluid action sequences and rapid response time. Every frame will be rendered smoothly with crystal clarity and without stutter. Whether you’re a demanding professional requiring extremely detailed information for CAD-CAM solutions, using 3D graphic applications or a financial wizard working on huge spreadsheets, this display will make your work easier and more efficient. Philip LowBlue Mode and flicker-free technology protects your eyes from harmful blue rays and prevents eye fatigue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally in the 2000's
reviews.reviewText: Great monitors, perfect size. I got the smaller 22 inch size but I got two of them. I got these. Because I needed multiple screens so I could do Forex trading. I never understood why these stock market guys had all these screens going until I started doing it. And so Phillips 22 inch was a perfect size for my desk. It was really affordable, really great quality. This is like a no frills monitor situation, But they're bright. They run well, no issues. Um. What else can I say? It's a good buy. I would buy them it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've bought other Phillips products in the past and have been Impressed with their quality and longevity. I hope for the same thing for this monitor. Easy stand assembly and easy to plug in. Monitor presents a clear and crisp visual experience. The only negative I can find, about this monitor, is where the input and power ports are located on the back of the monitor. Other than that this monitor seems like a winner for the price I paid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price, mounts easily
reviews.reviewText: I got this monitor as a second screen to put in portrait orientation for reading documents or Discord chat. Mounted it on a VESA arm and the original base was easily removed. It works great for this purpose (I only need 1920 x 1080) and looks sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clear and Sharp Visuals
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the PHILIPS 22 inch Class Thin Full HD Monitor, and it has completely transformed the way I work with my MacBook Air. As a MacBook user, I found myself in need of a larger screen for various tasks, and this monitor has proven to be a fantastic addition to my workspace.The 22-inch Full HD display with a resolution of 1920 x 1080 is crisp and vibrant, delivering clear and sharp visuals. Whether I'm working on documents, writing and emails, the monitor's 75Hz refresh rate provides smooth and enjoyable performance. The size of the screen is perfect for my needs, offering a noticeable upgrade in screen real estate without taking up too much space on my desk.Connecting the MacBook Air to the monitor was a breeze, thanks to the HDMI and VGA ports. It has simplified my multitasking, allowing me to have multiple windows open side by side without straining my eyes. The VESA mount compatibility is a bonus, giving me the flexibility to position the monitor at the perfect angle for my comfort.However, the only downside I encountered with this monitor was the absence of an integrated camera. I hadn't realized this when making my purchase, and I missed having a built-in camera for video calls. It's not a deal-breaker, but it's something to keep in mind if video conferencing is a significant part of your workflow. A separate webcam or using the MacBook's camera is a solution, but it would have been more convenient if the monitor included one.The PHILIPS 22 inch Class Thin Full HD Monitor has been a game-changer for my MacBook Air setup. It's a cost-effective solution for anyone looking to expand their screen real estate and improve productivity. The crisp display, ease of connection, and VESA compatibility make it a solid choice. Just be aware that it doesn't come with a built-in camera, and you may need to consider additional options if video conferencing is essential for your work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the best monitor on the market. Great picture and color at an unbeatable price .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome for Gaming
reviews.reviewText: My son went from a TV to this monitor and he loves the graphic quality which is much better than a TV. It does not come with speakers so you have to order those separate. Works perfectly with his XBox One.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great monitor. It’s easy to set up, and a great size.
Lo compré porque tiene una muy buena resolución FullHD. Adicional trae un puerto HDMI, un VGA, y puerto de salida de audio. Lo recomiendo para tareas básicas, pero también es bueno para juegos de PC.

I got this to replace my Dell P-Series 24 inch monitor which sadly got broken in an accident. This one is inferior in terms of quality of material and image quality. There are these visible lines on it (not sure what they are called) that are kind of not ideal. But I appreciate that it is light to carry, compact, and very good enough
